attributes.additional_details: In the wake of the recent crises at the BBC, this is a petition to force Lord Patten to step down as chairman of the BBC Trust, over his handling of the George Entwhistle payment of £450,000 for 54 days in the job and the fact that this decision is spitting in the face of the licence fee payer.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Lord Patten and the BBC Trust. The BBC Trust is independent of Government.
